text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Projectile converts a Zombie into a Pumpkin Zombie, then needs to recharge. Can only convert non-Covered medium Zombies.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Pumpkin Witch is a powerful arcane mage. For example, it can control its broom to clean the floor, cook, do the dishes...

pages.title: ‚≠ê Enchant Family
pages.text: $(#25228d)Throws a pumpkin that transforms normal Zombies into explosive ones.
